message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $180?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $180 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $150.
